author: cmlenz
msg: Add an experimental special <proxy> container type. This can be used to insert a proxy server (for example a HTTP protocol tracer) between the test caller and the actual container.
The proxy container allows setting of a different port for this purpose. The actual container definition is nested inside the proxy element.
Note: there's some duplication between this class and the CactusTask$Containers class, which I'll need to eliminate.

author: cmlenz
msg: Instead of setting the cookies as header, use the HttpState class provided by Commons-HttpClient.
For me, this solves the build errors seen in recent Gump builds.

author: cmlenz
msg: Extract Methods createHttpClientCookie() and createHttpClientCookies() from the rather bloated getCookieString()

author: cmlenz
msg: Add assertion that the request contains cookies at all, to avoid NPE
